name: Contour Gap Fix
description: Checks if contours have gaps, and bridges them if so

inputs.name: Boundary
inputs.description: The boundary rectangle to clip to

inputs.name: Maximum Distance
inputs.description: The maximum distance allowed as a gap between two contours

outputs.name: Contours
outputs.description: The contours with gaps filled in

outputs.name: Joins
outputs.description: The joins used to fill in the gaps (for reference)
